meanings.sent1: The dancer was whirling around the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: The wind was whirling the leaves in circles.
meanings.sent3: The whirling puppy chased its tail in excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were whirling like a tornado in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The whirling colors of the carousel mesmerized the children.

meanings.sent1: The whirling of the fan kept the room cool.
meanings.sent2: The whirling of the tornado caused destruction in its path.
meanings.sent3: The whirling of the washing machine made a rhythmic sound.
meanings.sent4: The whirling of the Earth around the sun creates seasons.
meanings.sent5: The whirling of the ballerina's skirt added grace to her dance.
